Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is being developed all over the world at present as a future energy conversion device.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The alternative anode materials are also being studied in order to develop efficient low temperature SOFCs (LTSOFCs) operating below 800 degrees C. Ni-based cermets are still the most promising anode materials and some targeted modifications are needed to improve the coking resistance and to enhance their electro-catalytic activity relatively at low temperature (similar to 600 - 700 degrees C) range.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Present work is aimed to develop alternate anode materials such as, NiO-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta-Ce0.9Y0.1O2-delta, NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta-Ce0.8Y0.2O2-delta, NiO-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta-Ce0.9Sm0.1O2-delta, NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta, NiO-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta and NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta for by simple chemical precipitation route and characterize them towards application in SOFC systems.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The precursor materials used in this synthesis were cerium nitrate hexahydrate, gadolinium nitrate, yttrium nitrate, samarium nitrate
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: [as basic materials] and sodium hydroxide [as precipitator material].
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: C-TAB (cetyl trimethylammonium bromide) was used as a surfactant in order to avoid the agglomeration of the nanoparticles.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The influence of Gd, Y and Sm doping on the phase structure development of ceria was investigated.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The prepared anode materials were characterized by TGA, XRD, FTIR, particle size analysis, SEM and EDAX.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The electrical characteristics of the materials were studied by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The results obtained were discussed in order to use the materials as alternate anode materials for SOFCs.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of NiO Based Nano-ceramic Composites as Alternative Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)
